selected_links.title: Missed bins
strengths: Direct link to specific information about missed bin collections
The web page provides instructions on how to report a missed bin
selected_links.reasoning: The provided snippet indicates that this resource is specifically designed for reporting and handling missed bin situations. It stands out as the most direct and relevant link for council customer information needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content does not provide any information relating to how to report a missed bin collection or the steps a resident should take in this situation. Instead, it shows a 403 error message suggesting that the Fareham Borough Council website is currently unavailable.
Reason.next_actions: Contact Fareham Borough Council through email (webmaster@fareham.gov.uk) or wait for the website to become available again and try to find the necessary information.

key_gaps_or_improvements: Content should include information on reporting a missed bin collection.

risk_factors: Poor content quality - consider changing strategy
optimization_suggestions: Try different search approach to break repetitive pattern
